game.name: Sweet Starlight Sisters
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: “Sweet Starlight Sisters” is a character-raising romance adventure where you share a sweet life under one roof with the bunny-girl sisters Anya and Sanya. Train the duo with your own hands to become top performers, and—while occasionally fielding their heart-pounding advances—lead them to victory.
game.shortDescriptionEn: “Sweet Starlight Sisters” is a character-raising romance adventure where you share a sweet life under one roof with the bunny-girl sisters Anya and Sanya. Train the duo with your own hands to become top performers, and—while occasionally fielding their heart-pounding advances—lead them to victory.
